Title: Series: The Abbott Papyrus
Description: Papyrus; Hieratic legal text verso and recto: tomb-robbery.
Curator's comments: Published : Theodorides, RdE 21, p. 97 (7, 11-14) and p. 101 (5, 5-8). Dockets to be republished by CJ Eyre and M Collier (agreed 2006); N. Strudwick, Masterpieces of Ancient Egypt, London 2006, pp. 232-3 (pl. on p. 233 wrongly labelled as EA 10021).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381251) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381251)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loose Black ink Red ink Inlaid: brown paper Tabbed: glassine paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: D Curatorial condition comment: fair
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Henry William Charles Abbott
